title: There IS one good thing out of the recent patches
body: they color coded the little symbols for the rune trees so i dont spend an extra 10-15 seconds trying to figure out whats what

>
> Yay, after only 9 months!

Small indie company bro
It was so bad that it made me uninstall the game :)
